TypeSignature.Value: public interface IByteChannel : IDisposable, Java.Nio.Channels.IReadableByteChannel, Java.Nio.Channels.IWritableByteChannel

.class public interface auto ansi abstract IByteChannel implements class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class Java.IO.ICloseable, class Java.Nio.Channels.IChannel, class Java.Nio.Channels.IReadableByteChannel, class Java.Nio.Channels.IWritableByteChannel, class System.IDisposable

Docs.summary: A ByteChannel is both readable and writable.

remarks.para: A ByteChannel is both readable and writable.

The methods for the byte channel are precisely those defined by readable and writable byte channels.
